t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Your Brand Store is a storefront where your brand can engage, convert, and build loyalty with millions of Amazon shoppers. On your Brand Store, you can showcase your full suite of products, drive product education, and tell your unique story with engaging content like lifestyle imagery or videos.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - Buy for Me is currently live in the Amazon Shopping app on both iOS and Android for a subset of U.S. customers. We will begin testing with a limited number of brand stores and products, with plans to roll out to more customers and incorporate more brand stores and products based on feedback.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 13 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
